title: "Companies must not use facial recognition to judge staff, says Council of Europe"
excerpt: "The use of facial recognition technology to hire and fire people based on their moods, personality or level of engagement in the workplace should be outlawed, according to proposals to be unveiled on Thursday by the 47-country Council of Europe."
